metadata.title: CVE-2015-8466 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Swift3 before 1.9 allows remote attackers to conduct replay attacks via anAuthorization request that lacks a Date header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8466` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

swift-plugin-s3 - 1.11-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: swift-plugin-s3 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.11-2').
